title: Bank Unions write to Finance Minister for merger of RRBs with Sponsor Banks
description: The merger of Regional Rural Banks with Sponsor Banks, as demanded by bank unions, aims to enhance efficiency, viability, and sustainability in the banking sector. This strategic move will not only improve employee skills and governance but also mobilize deposits, streamline credit delivery, and benefit the rural population significantly.
